game.name: Raccoon Adventure City Simulator 3D
game.description:
Join this latest brand new running game and forget all the adventure challenges you have ever tried! There are lots of reasons here to get you surprised and bring the best fun and thrill on the plate of your entertainment without download. Play as a raccoon in this extremely popular adventure game named Raccoon Adventure City Simulator 3D! This adventure will allow you to explore the big city the surrounding forest in your own style.

Your objective in this HTML5 running challenge is to help your chosen character raccoon eat his desired food and make sure that it will not get into trouble. This forest is full of deadly obstacles so your job is to keep your raccoon away from them to survive for long.  There are lots of predators to deal with here for you. Try to help the other raccoons as well to make your raccoon develop and grow stronger! Make sure to roam through the awesome cityscape.

Any human population avoids a horde of dangerous raccoons. You have to take care of multiple things like from arranging food for him and delivering goods, if needed to driving a boat or a car. Control your raccoon by moving and clicking in this 3D city simulator! Help him to choose a perfect mate for him and make some baby raccoons together! Complete missions and quests to earn points and later upgrade the power and appearance of your raccoons like facial features and different fur coat colors! Enjoy more free animal games and have a blast online for free to play!
